Desc.entry: Provides training on a one-to-one basis to enable individual speakers to achieve the vocal quality they want, to eliminate bad habits and develop a clear confident voice. Voice training by a qualified, specialist teacher of Speech and Drama for meetings, interviews, presentations, speeches, lectures, teaching and auditions. Voice coaching to deal with mumbling, boring voice, nerves, gabbling, pitch and inadequate volume. Customised in house training/presentation for organisations.
